FuncDef:
The display port-mirroring integration command displays integrated port mirroring configurations.
The display port-mirroring command displays the configuration of port mirroring on an interface board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Specifies the slot number of the interface board where the configuration of port mirroring needs to be displayed. The specified interface board must be installed. If slot slot-id is not specified, the configurations of port mirroring on all installed interface boards are displayed.
-

Examples: Interface                 Vlan CAR         Type   In/Out       WithLinkHeader Instance                         QinqMirNum           SliceSize
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check integrated port mirroring configurations, run the display port-mirroring integration command.
Run the display port-mirroring interface command to view the configuration of a specified mirrored port.
Run the display port-mirroring interface slot command to view the configuration of all the mirrored ports on a specified interface board.
